description: Shopee Open Platform documentation for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs
notes:
This appears to be the main introduction page of Shopee Open Platform documentation. Key information extracted:

- Languages supported: English, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Português, ไทย
- Main sections visible:
  * Getting Started
  * Developer account registration
  * App management
  * API calls
  * Push Mechanism notifications
  * Authorization and Authentication
  * Sandbox Testing V2
  * Service Partner Program
  * Various API Integration Guides

The page contains general platform information rather than specific API endpoint documentation. It describes platform capabilities, benefits, and access requirements for two types of users:
1. Software service providers
2. Sellers with software development capabilities

powerful_apis.description: Access to APIs for orders, products, marketing and push notification services

developer_services.description: End-to-end developer support for onboarding, APP development, testing, release, and maintenance
